alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:10AM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Chinle, Dilkon, Holbrook, Kayenta, Kykotsmovi, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman, Snowflake-Taylor and Winslow. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Snow forecast from 2 AM Sunday to 5 PM Sunday: Chinle 2 to 4 inches Dilkon 1 to 3 inches Holbrook 0 to 1 inches Kayenta 1 to 3 inches Kykotsmovi 1 to 3 inches Prescott 3 to 5 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches Sedona 3 to 5 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches Snowflake-Taylr 1 to 2 inches Winslow 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains
